description:
Skips the title screen and goes directly to New Game option. This way you can handle your title screen from an empty map, completely customizable with default engine commands or other plugins. Also adds extra options to check if a save slot exists and to delete it.

Note: the Load Game scene was meant to be used from the title screen only, so it still draws the default title screen background when called. One simple workaround is to set the title screen background to an empty (transparent) png.
name: Skip title
